sentences: Ben Carey is an Australian guitarist born on January 10, 1975 in Warburton, Victoria, Australia.
From 1998 to 2000 Carey joined Savage Garden on their Affirmation World Tour as band guitarist, performing  "I Knew I Loved You", "Affirmation", "Crash & Burn", and other songs.
In 2004, Carey joined Lifehouse after the departure of Sean Woolstenhulme, brother of drummer Rick Woolstenhulme, Jr.
In 2009, Lifehouse announced that Carey was an official member, stating he was "family to us".
He featured in the band's videos "Broken", "Halfway Gone", "All In" and "Between the Raindrops" in 2012.
In December 2014, the band announced that Carey would leave to focus on other projects, such as his band Elvis Monroe.
